parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Yeah, we just got back all the kingdoms agreed to join. So, we are one - \|\|\^
If only Mother, Father and Leya had been here to see we did it Cedric. \|\|\^
Yes it is sad that they’re not here with us. But I like to imagine they’re - \|\|\^
And Cedric if it isn’t painfully obvious to you yet… you are the phenomenal - \|\|\^
- fighter you always wanted to be. We would never have been able to accomplish - \|\|\^
- what we have if you weren’t here. \|\|\^
It’s true. You have done so much for the realm. \|\|\^
Thank you guys so much. It wasn’t an easy journey for us but we’re here. \|\|\^

-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
You're right for the new to begin we must put an end to the old. \|\|\^
Richard! Dormato! You guys are late. Roswell is dead. \|\|\^
Ah, I really wanted to give him the last strike! \|\|\^
Well if Roswell is dead that means his army is officially finished as - \|\|\^
- well. Without a leader they are destabilised, it will be just the smaller - \|\|\^
- armies that were left the kingdoms that will need to be taken out. - \|\|\^
- Cedric and I will ride South whilst you Richard will ride north and - \|\|\^
- free the northern kingdoms. We will then come back here and meet. \|\|\^
That's a good plan you two be safe. I'll be on my way. \|\|\^
Why do I have to travel with him? We don’t get along at all. I’ll go by myself. \|\|\^
Seriously Cedric? The kingdoms are at stake. \|\|\^
I’m willing to travel with you so you should be able to do the same. \|\|\^
You might be planning to have me killed again. \|\|\^
What? It doesn’t matter. Cedric, please just go with him. We can sort this - \|\|\^
Fine. Well then... let’s head south. The first kingdom will be... Hyde. \|\|\^

Ah, I must say you sure have proven to be a great warrior but isn't it - \|\|\^
- time you put your childish games aside. Do you even know what you're - \|\|\^
We are fighting for freedom! We want our homes back! What you've done - \|\|\^
Wrong? How am I any different to you and all those who came before us? - \|\|\^
- Wanting power and actively reaching out and taking it. I saw the need - \|\|\^
- for a new era. A chance to remove the problems of this world one by one. - \|\|\^
- Come on, young Cedric side with me? You know it’s the right thing to do. - \|\|\^
- You and I are alike. I too was once a weak little boy that no one thought was - \|\|\^
- going to be anything. I can help show you how to make those people give - \|\|\^
- you your respect. I’ll also let you and the remains of your family live - \|\|\^
- whilst I continue the job you and your brother gave me. To rule. \|\|\^
You were to rule the kingdoms of Lamar, Rinsar and Deer in our absence - \|\|\^
- whilst Richard and I stabilised the rest of the realm. You have gone - \|\|\^
- well beyond your remit and it's time to put it to an end. No one needed - \|\|\^
Fool for a new chapter to begin you must end the old chapter. \|\|\^

Like I said Young Cedric you’re a great warrior but you're no match for me. - \|\|\^
- You will witness the true extent of my abilities. As you die a new era - \|\|\^
- shall rise. My plans and visions for Odaria will finally come to fruition. \|\|\^
